ehotel.inter
Interface AMDVod

public interface AMDVod

AMDVod interface supply functions to manipulate database in Admin-VOD side.

Since:
SDK1.6
Version:
ehotel2.0
Author:
hoavk@elcom.com.vn

Method Detail

addSubject

int addSubject(java.lang.String subjName,
               java.lang.String urlImage,
               int parentId)
create a new VOD Subject

Parameters:
subjName - new subject name to add to the system
parentId - the level of subject in tree
Returns:
return sequence value which save in database.if the subject is completely added.-1 otherwise.

removeSubject

boolean removeSubject(int subjId)
remove a subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to remove
Returns:
true if the subject is completely removed. false otherwise.

editSubject

int editSubject(int subjId,
                java.lang.String newName,
                java.lang.String urlImage,
                int langId)
update information of subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to update info
newName - a new desired subject's name
langId - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
return 1 if the subject is completely updated. -1 is duplicate name otherwise.

getSubjectInfo

Subject getSubjectInfo(int subjId,
                       int langid)
get detail information of a subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to get info
langid - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
Subject. The object contain entire information (such as id,name,urlImage). May be is null.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException , java.lang.NullPointerException

get detail information of a movie

Parameters:

langId - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
return The object which contain entire movie information (such as title,actor,direction,plot,poster). Maybe be null

updateVod

                  int langid)
update information of movie

Parameters:
vod - The object contain entire movie information (such as title,actor,direction,plot,poster). Should not be null
langid - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
true if the movie is completely updated. false otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException ,

                  java.lang.String str_vod_id)
remove movies from a subject

Parameters:
subjId -
str_vod_id - Start brackets '(' and ending ')'. The VodId comma separated such as format (vodId1,vodId2,vodI3)
Returns:
true if the movie is completely removed. false otherwise.

java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException ,

Parameters:

langid - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
fromRow - Begining data is fromRow
ttoRow - Ending data is ttoRow
Returns:

changeSubjectOfSvcVod

                              java.lang.String str_newSubjId)
change movie from this subject to another subjects in content side

Parameters:
vodId - A sequence of the desired movie for changing
newSubjId - Start brackets '(' and ending ')'. The SubjId comma separated such as format (SubjId1,SubjId2,SubjId3) A sequence of new desired subject for changing
Returns:
true if the value is completely changed. false otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException

countVodOfSubject

int countVodOfSubject(int subjId)
count movie in the subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject
Returns:
0 if there is no song in the subject. value greater than 0 otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException

langid - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
fromRow - Begining data is fromRow
ttoRow - Ending data is ttoRow
Returns:
